entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary:
Welcome to my new blog! This is where I plan to blog about programming topics and my hobbies.

I plan to blog about programming topics regarding C#, rust, TypeScript, and software design. I also plan to blog about my hobbies which include charcuterie and 3d printing. Stay tuned for more! My first real post will be about my new project query_rs. A set of macros and iterators that emulate the C# LINQ syntax inside of rust.
